casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
HENRY D. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 21, 2017

Raymond L. Durelli, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Adam E. Mattei, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 163 Conn. App. 265, 163 A.3d 642 (2017), is denied.

ROBINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
